[h1]Mac OS X:[/h1]

Portal 2, a stratedy game that keeps you engaged. Highly recommended.

[list]
[*]Consistently clever and challenging puzzles
[*]Excellent single-player and co-op campaigns
[*]Fantastic presentation and audio design
[/list]
This was a flippin' good Science Fiction testing initiative game

Invest in the first Portal before you buy this one. Don't make the same mistake I did. You miss out on a lot! But if you do buy this game without the first one, you won't regret it too much. It does a good job at explaining things. 

PROS: 
~Awesome Story Line
~Visually appealing
~Challenging levels
~Cute turrents
~Co-op mode
~Keeps you engaged
~You can make your own maps! 

CONS:
~If your friends don't take steam achievements seriously, you won't reach all of the Co-op achievements within a short amount of time.
~Loading time inbetween chapters and when the game starts can take a bit.
~Takes up a lot of your time, especially if you are procastinating from homework. 

Rating: 10/10 would play again. 

Thanks for taking the time to read my review! ^.^
Thumbs up.

This game is amazing, i have beat it twice(not on this account, obviosly), it is about 12 hours long, 6 more for the co-op campaign, so it is way longer than the first. This is the best puzzle game there is.
Get this game just for the cute robot buddy you get to hang with. This game beats Portal One any day... It gives me motivation to complete puzzles.

Игра - прорыв в сфере игровой индустрии. Совершенная и новая во всех смыслах: геймплэй, сюжет, персонажи. Очень надеюсь на продолжение. Сам проходил эту часть уже раз сто, и наверное, буду проходить еще тысячу.

Оценка:10/10

WHAT ARE YOU DOING?! READING THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS, HUH?! Well portal your way onto the store page please and buy this game! You will not be sorry!

Actual Review:
This awesome sequel to the original Portal game offers much to the franchise and is one of the greatest puzzle games I've ever played! It has a great plot, great voice acting, and great effects. And you can get Portal Stories: Mel (which is like a separate Portal game by itself) as DLC for free! Conversion, another DLC for Portal 2 is coming soon and I can't wait to get it. I rate this game 9.5/10.

EDIT: Conversion is gone from Steam. Something to do with the makers of the mod being too lazy to finish it.

So why do I have 152 hours on this game? It's because the cake was a lie.

This game is so awesome. I love coming back to this game when I'm bored and just go through the story again. It always keeps me interested and gets my heart pumping! The graphics are awesome also and there is always something new to find in the game. There are so many hidden entrances that are so much fun to find!!!!

Hra s dobrým příběhem, úžasnou Co-operací a od našeho milovaného Valve. Co ještě můžeme chtít ?
Tady už nám může přece scházet jenom více misí. Výborně provedená Co-operace nám totiž zajistí spoustu zábavy a také nám potrápí mozek (což potřebuje jednou za čas každý) Na Workshopu si může v případě dokončení hry stáhnout nějaké zajímavé mapy takže na nějakou dobu máme klid. Za mě není hře co vytknout, zážitek byl poměrně vysoký a určitě se k ní ještě někdy vrátím. 8/10
-------------------------
+ Workshop
+ Co-operace
+ příběh
- Kde je 3. díl ?

SPOILER ALERT!

One of the best games I've EVER played.
The story, the voice acting, the look of the whole game, the comedy, the betrayals, the puzzles, the ending... just everything was awesome!
The part where you shoot the portal onto the moon is brilliant, and the song at the end with the singing turrets was awesome!
The emotion of the characters is really good, the end was especially emotional.
Much better than Portal 1! I thought Portal 1 was one of the best games ever until I played Portal 2.
I definetely reccomend it.
This game is for everyone, no matter what genre of game you like, you'll love this.
I want to wipe my brain and play it again!
No doubts, everyone must play this.

The fact that GLaDOS is an irritating edgelord during single-player parts 2 through 4 making those parts quite a drag and every interaction with Wheatley at those points is outweighed by the sheer awesomeness of the rest of the game. So just power through. Chuck it on mute if you have to. There's 9 parts anyway so at least about 70% of singleplayer is still good.

And then there's coop mode and the level editor. Coop's definitely worth nagging someone to play, and the level editor and fancy workshop integration thingimajigness lets you inflict other peoples' pain on you.

Anyway, if you don't have this game by now, it should probably be your next purchase. Alongside the first Portal game if you haven't got that already. Which is a lot shorter than Portal 2. Which is why you should also get Portal 2 if you haven't got that either.

Portal 2 to gra w której czasami jednak trzeba się pożądnie zastanowić aby przejść poziom.Grafika w grze jest według mnie dobra/bardzo dobra chociaż mogłaby być nieco lepsza...Grę przeszedłem dosyć szybko co według mnie jest minusem tej gry (za mało poziomów etc...) ale za to mamy tryb multiplayer dzięki któremu można pograć ze znajomymi lub jakąś randomową osobą co według mnie jest spoko.Fajna jest możliwość ulepszania sobie robota względem wizualnym.Ocena końcowa:Myśle że gra zasługuje na takie 8+/10.Fajnie by było jakby wyszedł Portal 3 może byłby ciekawszy i lepszy względem całej rozgrywki itd...

Nun also mein Review zu Portal 2.
Zuerst sei gesagt, dass ich ein großer Fan der Portal Reihe bin, und immernoch auf einen dritten Teil warte (haha!) 

Mich hat Portal 2 viele Stunden an den Bildschirm gefesselt. (Das liegt sicher auch an den unzählichen Leveln, die von Usern im integrierten Level-Editor erstellt wurden) Die Spielmechanik erinnert natürlich an Portal - ist ja auch Logisch. Der Kooperative Modus ist auch ein Kernelement des Spiels und macht mit einem Kumpel, der real neben einem sitzt sogar noch mehr Spaß.
Eventuell erweitere ich dieses Review später noch ein wenig.
Alles in allem eine sehr gute fortsetzung des Klassikers Portal.

[h1] If the laws of physics no longer apply in the future, God help you.[/h1] 


---------------------------剧透注意------------------------------


伴随着GLaDOS用戏谑又带着温情的语调说出"I want you gone"，听着炮塔之歌，返回地面，一望无际的金色麦田在"我"眼前徐徐展开。
心底忽地漾开一份迷的感动，淡淡的温暖情愫在胸口鼓动着。

[h1]剧情[/h1]
关于传送门的剧情，曾经看到过一个脑洞：
主角Chell其实是光圈科技创始人Cave Johnson与他的秘书Caroline的女儿，而GLaDOS则是存储了Caroline智慧与人格的机器人。
于是，便上演了母女相爱相杀的戏码(雾

关于这一说法，倒是有注意到主角在探索废旧实验室时，广播中Cave Johnson说过的一段话
[quote=Cave Johnson]问题是：如果我们可以在光盘上存储音乐，为什么我们不能在上面存储一个人的智慧与人格?所以我让工程师来想想办法。
大脑映射。人工智能。我们应该在三十年前就开始从事这方面的研究。我会这么说——我会把它录到磁带上，让每个人都一天到晚反复地听：如果我在你们能把我灌入一台电脑之前死，那么我想要让Caroline来负责这个地方。 [/quote]

曾跟EX讨论过Wheatley人格转变的原因——
他沉吟了一会，问了我一句："还记得那个勇士与恶龙的故事吗?"
"掌权了最终也变成了恶龙吗?"

缅甸有这么一个传说：有一条恶龙，每年要求村庄献祭一个处女，每年这个村庄都会有一个少年英雄去与恶龙搏斗，但无人生还。又一个英雄出发时，有人悄悄尾随。龙穴铺满金银财宝，英雄用剑刺死恶龙，然后坐在尸身上，看着闪烁的珠宝，慢慢地长出鳞片、尾巴和触角，最终变成恶龙。——《在缅甸寻找奥威尔》

细细想来，确实有异曲同工之妙——GLaDOS曾经想杀死主角。而Wheatley作为"正义"的伙伴，帮助主角去打倒GLaDOS。而当他战胜GLaDOS，握有实权之时，他似乎变成了另一个GLaDOS。

[h1]画面[/h1]
较1代精细太多，场景也更为宽广。
"[i]漫无边际的地下空间，好比2001太空漫游中的浩淼宇宙[/i]"
周遭残破的环境营造出来的废墟感，更是透出一种寂寥又科幻的美感。

[h1]音乐[/h1]
说到传送门的音乐，印象最深的当属第八章中的bgm [url=http://music.163.com/#/song?id=3939091]Machiavellian Bach[/url]
正如评论所说，巴赫的哥德堡变奏曲配上电子音如同变幻的科技金属积木。

最后放上机核网的传送门同人歌曲 [url=http://www.g-cores.com/articles/15801]If I were a core[/url]

当之无愧的神作。
将FPS 剧情 解谜完美融于一体。

Shorter and somewhat less challenging than the original Portal, but also more polished, with a more developed story, great voice acting, and some new mechanics. Definitely one of the best games ever made. If you haven't played the first game, get (and play through) that one first - it will make the story and jokes in Portal 2 a lot more enjoyable.
